description: Lightsaber Form Powers from Jedi Academy Training Manual
notes: These Form Powers are tagged with the [Lightsaber Form] descriptor. You must be wielding an activated Lightsaber to use any Form Power. You cannot Rebuke a Lightsaber Form Power, with two exceptions: Draw Closer and Pushing Slash.

powers.name: Assured Strike
powers.description: You trade power for accuracy.

dcChart.effect: Make a single melee attack with a Lightsaber against the target, rolling twice and keeping the higher result. However, you take a -5 penalty on your damage roll.
Make a single melee attack with a Lightsaber against the target, rolling twice and keeping the higher result. However, you take a -2 penalty on your damage roll.
Make a single melee attack with a Lightsaber against the target, rolling twice and keeping the higher result. However, you take a -1 penalty on your damage roll.

powers.formBonus: Lightsaber Form (Juyo): If you have the Juyo Talent and miss with both attack rolls, this Form Power remains in your Force Power Suite instead of being spent as normal.
powers.special: You can spend a Force Point to roll your attack roll three times, keeping the highest result.
powers.forcePointEffect: Roll your attack roll three times, keeping the highest result.

powers.name: Barrier of Blades
powers.description: You whip your Lightsaber around you, creating a barrier through which blaster fire rarely penetrates.
powers.effect: Make a Use the Force check. Until the start of your next turn, you can use the results of the Use the Force check in place of your Reflex Defense against incoming non-Area Attack ranged attacks.

powers.special: You can spend a Force Point to have this Form Power also apply to attacks from ranged weapons set to Autofire. If such an attack hits you while this Form Power is in effect, you take half damage; if it misses you, you take no damage.
powers.forcePointEffect: This Form Power also applies to attacks from ranged weapons set to Autofire. If such an attack hits you while this Form Power is in effect, you take half damage; if it misses you, you take no damage.

powers.name: Circle of Shelter
powers.description: You create a protected area around yourself, through which enemies have difficulty reaching you or your allies.

powers.name: Contentious Opportunity
powers.description: You seize the moment when your opponent gives you an opening, darting in to strike.
powers.trigger: When you make an Attack of Opportunity

dcChart.effect: You can make a single melee attack with a Lightsaber against the target, and you deal +1 die of damage with your attack if you hit.
You can make a single melee attack with a Lightsaber against the target, and you deal +2 dice of damage with your attack if you hit.
You can make a single melee attack with a Lightsaber against the target, and you deal +3 dice of damage with your attack if you hit.
You can make a single melee attack with a Lightsaber against the target, and you deal +4 dice of damage with your attack if you hit.

powers.formBonus: Lightsaber Form (Makashi): If you have the Makashi Talent, you gain a +2 Force bonus on Attacks of Opportunity against the target until the end of your next turn.
powers.special: You can spend a Force Point to reduce the target's speed by 2 squares (to a minimum of 1 square) until the start of your next turn.
powers.forcePointEffect: Reduce the target's speed by 2 squares (to a minimum of 1 square) until the start of your next turn.

powers.name: Deflecting Slash
powers.target: Self, plus one enemy within reach
powers.description: You use the momentum from your effort to deflect a projectile to strike at an adjacent opponent.
powers.trigger: When you are the target of a ranged attack
powers.effect:
Make a Use the Force check. Compare the result of your Use the Force check against the attack roll of the incoming ranged attack. If your Use the Force check equals or exceeds the incoming attack roll, the attack deals half damage on a hit. You can then immediately make a single melee attack with a Lightsaber against an adjacent target, gaining a bonus to your attack roll and damage roll based on the difference between your check and the attack roll:

• +1 to +5: +1 bonus to attack and damage
• +6 to +10: +2 bonus to attack and damage
• +11 to +15: +3 bonus to attack and damage
• +16 or more: +5 bonus to attack and damage
powers.formBonus: Lightsaber Form (Soresu): If you have the Soresu Talent, you can redirect the attack against an enemy within 6 squares and within line of sight instead of dealing half damage (as per the Redirect Shot Talent).
powers.special: You can spend a Force Point to take no damage from the incoming attack if your Use the Force check equals or exceeds the attack roll.
powers.forcePointEffect: Take no damage from the incoming attack if your Use the Force check equals or exceeds the attack roll.

powers.name: Disarming Slash
powers.description: You strike at your opponent's weapon, attempting to rip it from their grasp.

dcChart.effect: You make a single melee attack with a Lightsaber against the target. If the attack hits, compare the result of your Use the Force check to the target's Reflex Defense +5. If your Use the Force check equals or exceeds this number, your target is disarmed.

You make a single melee attack with a Lightsaber against the target. If the attack hits, compare the result of your Use the Force check to the target's Reflex Defense +2. If your Use the Force check equals or exceeds this number, your target is disarmed.

Shii-Cho.name: Form I: Shii-Cho
Shii-Cho.description: The most ancient lightsaber form, emphasizing wide, sweeping strikes.

Makashi.name: Form II: Makashi
Makashi.description: An elegant dueling form focused on precision and efficiency.

Soresu.name: Form III: Soresu
Soresu.description: The ultimate defensive form, emphasizing protection and deflection.

Ataru.name: Form IV: Ataru
Ataru.description: An acrobatic form using the Force to enhance physical prowess.

Shien.name: Form V: Shien/Djem So
Shien.description: An aggressive counter-attacking form (Shien for blasters, Djem So for blades).

Djem So.name: Form V: Djem So
Djem So.description: The blade-to-blade variant of Form V, emphasizing power and domination.

Niman.name: Form VI: Niman
Niman.description: A balanced form integrating Force powers with lightsaber combat.

Juyo.name: Form VII: Juyo
Juyo.description: An unpredictable and aggressive form bordering on the dark side.

Vaapad.name: Form VII: Vaapad
Vaapad.description: Mace Windu's variant of Juyo, channeling inner darkness while maintaining control.

Jar'Kai.name: Jar'Kai
Jar'Kai.description: The art of wielding two lightsabers simultaneously.

Sokan.name: Sokan
Sokan.description: A movement-focused form using environment and terrain to advantage.

Trakata.name: Trakata
Trakata.description: A controversial form using lightsaber activation/deactivation as a tactic.
